item.name: Lesser Vision Crystal
entries: This poor imitation of the real thing still hums with immense power, almost in defiance to it's original.
Lesser Vision Crystals are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Spiritwood Plank
entries: Infused with the spirits of the fallen this wood is desired by the greatest artisans of the world for it's incredibly strength and flexibility.
Spiritwood Planks are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Deldrimor Steel Ingot
entries: The creation process of Deldrimor Steel is one of the closest guarded secrets by the Deldrimor Dwarves. Very vew non-dwarves know how to create this ally, which is so much more than the sum of it's parts.
Deldrimor Steel Ingots are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Amulet of Gentle Repose
entries: This copper inlaid bone Amulet seems to weakly radiate divine energy, protecting its wearer from the ravages of time.
While wearing the Amulet, a creature is under the effect of the {@spell Gentle Repose} spell.

item.name: Battle Plans of the Great Dwarf
entries: These {@item Cartographer's Tools|XPHB} supposedly once belonged to the Great Dwarf and were used in his battle against the Great Destroyer.
While attuned to it, you gain the following benefits:
• You have advantage on all checks made with these tools.
• Once every 7 days, you can consult the battle plans on upcoming battles and gain a small glimpse into the future, revealing to you the lay of the land of your next great battle.

item.name: Tome of Capture
entries: This special Tome was crafted by Magi Malaquire and entrusted to you. He wants you to 'Capture them all', whatever that means.
As a reaction, when a hostile boss enemy within 150 feet reaches 0 hit points, or as a magic action, you can cast the {@spell Signet of Capture|GuildWars} spell using this tome.

When doing so, you can capture an unlimited number of spells in one casting of {@spell Signet of Capture|GuildWars}, but instead of learning them, they are recorded in this tome. Each spell captured rewards XP individually and is equally distributed between all creatures holding the tome or a bonded {@item Signet Ring of Signet of Capture|GuildWars}.
Certain powerful trainers can record spells in this book by spending 1 minute in study.
When recording a spell in the tome you must spend 25 gp per spell level, which can be drawn from any willing creature holding the tome or a bonded {@item Signet Ring of Signet of Capture|GuildWars}.

Any creature can learn a spell recorded in this tome, if it is on the creatures spell list, by spending 1 minute in study with the tome per spell level. When doing so, the creature can replace a currently prepared spell with the spell learned from this tome.
A spell can be learned from this tome an unlimited number of times by any creature holding the tome or a bonded {@item Signet Ring of Signet of Capture|GuildWars}.

item.name: Signet Ring of Signet of Capture
entries: This special Ring was crafted by Magi Malaquire and entrusted to you. He wants you to 'Capture them all', whatever that means.
As a reaction, when a hostile boss enemy within 150 feet reaches 0 hit points, or as a magic action, you can cast the {@spell Signet of Capture|GuildWars} spell using this ring.

When doing so, you can capture an unlimited number of spells in one casting of {@spell Signet of Capture|GuildWars}, but instead of learning them, they are recorded in the {@item Tome of Capture|GuildWars} this ring is bonded to. Each spell captured rewards XP individually and is equally distributed between all creatures holding the tome or a bonded {@item Signet Ring of Signet of Capture|GuildWars}.
When recording a spell in the tome you must spend 25 gp per spell level, which can be drawn from any willing creature holding the tome or a bonded {@item Signet Ring of Signet of Capture|GuildWars}.
As a magic action you can bond this ring to a {@item Tome of Capture|GuildWars}.

item.name: Light of Deldrimor
entries: The Light of Deldrimor is a legendary torch, said to have been forged by the Great Dwarf himself, when he forged the Dwarfs in Anvil Rock, to guide their way through the dark caves of the Shiverpeak Mountains.
The torch glows in a warm teal light.
As and action, a character holding the torch can ignite an object not being worn or carried within 5-feet of the wielder, transferring some of the warding magic.
Any creature friendly to the wielder within 10-feet of the Light of Deldrimor or any flame lit by it does not take damage from environmental cold effects.
While wielding the torch the following spells can be cast from it (fires ignited this way do not have the warding properties granted by the torch):
Cantrips (at will): {@spell Fire Bolt|PHB}, {@spell Control Flames|XGE}, {@spell Create Bonfire|XGE}, {@spell Produce Flame|PHB}

1st Level (1/day each): {@spell Burning Hands|PHB}, {@spell Chromatic Orb|PHB} (Fire), {@spell Faerie Fire|PHB}, {@spell Fire Storm (Guild Wars)|GuildWars}, {@spell Flare|GuildWars}, {@spell Hellish Rebuke|PHB}, {@spell Mind Burn|GuildWars}
2nd Level (1/day each): {@spell Aganazzar's Scorcher|XGE}, {@spell Continual Flame|PHB}, {@spell Inferno|GuildWars}, {@spell Fireball (Guild Wars)|GuildWars}
3rd Level (1/day each): {@spell Dispel Magic|PHB}, {@spell Fireball|PHB}, {@spell Immolate|GuildWars}
4th Level (2/day): {@spell Conjure Minor Elementals|PHB} ({@creature Azer|MM}), {@spell Fire Shield|PHB} (Warm), {@spell Phoenix|GuildWars}
5th Level (1/day): {@spell Meteor Shower|GuildWars}

item.name: Minaar's Explosive
entries: As an action, a character can throw a grenade at a point up to 60 feet away.

Each creature within a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
These grapefruit-sized bombs are the signature explosive used by Minaar Stonesledge, explosive expert of the Deldrimor dwarfs.

item.name: Minaar's Upgraded Explosive
entries: As an action, a character can throw a grenade at a point up to 60 feet away.

Each creature within a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) thunder damage and 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Enhanced by the infernal magics of the flame legion, Minaar's Explosive have reached a new level of destructive capability.

item.name: Potion of Arcane Recovery
entries: The potion's blue liquid crackles with arcane energy.
You can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If you have the Pact Magic feature you instead regain 1 spell slot.

item.name: Abaddon's Reach (Dormant)
entries: This longsword has a hilt which is in the shape of a mask with 6 eye slits, and tentacles coming out of it's back, making up the pommel.
'Act with magic, act within reason, act without mercy.' is inscribed on the blade.
You can use Abaddon's Reach as a spellcasting focus for your spells while attuned to it.
{@bold Dormant.} While Abaddon's Reach is in a dormant state, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon.
• You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
• When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 psychic damage.

• You gain an additional volatile 3rd level spell slot. Immediately after you cast a spell using that spell slot, roll a d20. If you roll a 1, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table to create a random magical effect, otherwise the number you need to roll increases by 1, until you trigger a roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, at which point it will reset to 1. A Wild Magic Surge can happen once per turn. You regain this spell slot when you finish a short or long rest.
{@bold Mastery: Sap.} If you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

item.name: Seeker (Dormant)
entries: This light crossbow is in the shape of a dragon's wing.
'Tyria's last hope rests on the unity of the races. The pooling of their strength. It is the only way.' is inscribed on the grip.
You can use Seeker as a spellcasting focus for your spells while attuned to it.
{@bold Dormant.} While Seeker is in a dormant state, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon.
• You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
• When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 piercing damage.

• The first attack roll you make with this weapon each turn scores a critical hit on a 19 or 20, if your target is within 5 feet of an ally of yours. If another feature or trait already gives you an increased critical hit range, increase that range by one instead.

{@bold Mastery: Slow.} If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to it, you can reduce its Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. If the creature is hit more than once by weapons that have this property, the Speed reduction doesn't exceed 10 feet.
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Brotherhood of the Dragon

item.name: The Core (Dormant)
entries: This flaming longsword is made of ornamented deldrimor steel, with a heavy core of infernal iron.
'Offer protection to the weak. Give solace and shelter to those who need it. Be ye a salve to the wounded.' is inscribed on the blade.
You can use The Core as a spellcasting focus for your spells while attuned to it.
{@bold Dormant.} While The Core is in a dormant state, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon.
• You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
• When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 fire damage.

• On your turn, when you score a critical hit against a creature with The Core or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with it, you gain temporary hit points equal to the challenge rating of the creature or your proficiency bonus, whichever is higher.

{@bold Mastery: Graze.}  If your attack roll with this weapon misses a creature, you can deal damage to that creature equal to the ability modifier you used to make the attack roll. This damage is the same type dealt by the weapon, and the damage can be increased only by increasing the ability modifier.
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Core Warband

item.name: Celestial Slicer (Dormant)
entries: This silver-bladed sickle glimmers softly with moonlight. When looking at the reflection on the blade you can see the night sky.
'Lead through actions, not words!' is inscribed on the silver blade.
You can use the Celestial Slicer as a spellcasting focus for your spells while attuned to it.
You can use the Celestial Slicer as a star map while attuned to it.
{@bold Dormant.} While the Celestial Slicer is in a dormant state, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon.
• You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
• When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 radiant damage.

• When you make ranged spell attack roll against a creature, you can target one additional creature and make a second attack roll against it. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus and regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

{@bold Mastery: Nick.} When you make the extra attack of the Light property, you can make it as part of the Attack action instead of as a Bonus Action. You can make this extra attack only once per turn.
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Ascalon Vanguard

item.name: Incursion Breaker (Dormant)
entries: This staff is imbued with powerful arcane magic.
'Our gift to the people of Tyria is that they never know just how much danger they've been in.' is inscribed along the shaft of the staff.
You can use Incursion Breaker as a spellcasting focus for your spells while attuned to it.
{@bold Dormant.} While Incursion Breaker is in a dormant state, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon.
• You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
• When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage.
• When you make ranged spell attack roll against a creature, which has been hit by your Tentacle of the Deeps this turn, you can give yourself advantage on that roll.

• When you force a creature to make a saving throw to take half damage, which has been hit by your Tentacle of the Deeps this turn, you can give that target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw made against the spell.

{@bold Mastery: Topple.} If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 plus the ability modifier used to make the attack roll and your Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, the creature has the Prone condition.
item.reqAttune: by a member of the Wizard's Court

item.name: Spear of Archemorus (Dormant)
entries: This spear is made from the bones of the legendary Luxon hero Archemorus, who single handedly slew Shiro the Betrayer.
'They who neither hesitate nor stumble shall be rewarded.' is etched into the bone of the shaft.
You can use the Spear of Archemorus as a spellcasting focus for your spells while attuned to it.
{@bold Dormant.} While the Spear of Archemorus is in a dormant state, you gain the following benefits:
• You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this magic weapon.
• You gain a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells.
• When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 1d6 force damage.

• Once per turn, as an action, you can teleport up to 60 feet next to a creature, which is concentrating on a spell, and make one attack using this weapon with advantage. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus and regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
• This magic weapon returns to your hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack roll.
{@bold Mastery: Sap.} If you hit a creature with this weapon, that creature has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of your next turn.

item.name: Lesser Vision Crystal
entries: This poor imitation of the real thing still hums with immense power, almost in defiance to it's original.
Lesser Vision Crystals are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Spiritwood Plank
entries: Infused with the spirits of the fallen this wood is desired by the greatest artisans of the world for it's incredibly strength and flexibility.
Spiritwood Planks are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Deldrimor Steel Ingot
entries: The creation process of Deldrimor Steel is one of the closest guarded secrets by the Deldrimor Dwarves. Very vew non-dwarves know how to create this ally, which is so much more than the sum of it's parts.
Deldrimor Steel Ingots are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Scepter of Orr
item.reqAttune: by a creature which is not a Aberration, Celestial, Elemental, Fey, Fiend, or Undead
entries: The Scepter of Orr is a relic from the kingdom of Orr which controls forces from beyond the known reality and makes this outer world obey the bearer's will.

{@bold Magic Weapon.} You gain a +3 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. You have advantage on attack rolls against Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, or Undead with this weapon and any Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, or Undead take an additional {@damage 3d6} pscychic damage when hit by this weapon.

{@bold Otherworldly Influence.} While you hold this weapon you are under the effect of the {@spell Protection from Evil and Good|XPHB} spell and have advantage on any Charisma (Persuasion) and Charisma (Intimidation) checks to influence Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, or Undead.

{@bold Magic.} The Scepter of Orr has 20 charges and regains {@dice 1d10 + 3} expended charges daily at dawn. You can take a Magic action to cast one of the spells (save DC 20) on the following table (no material components required). The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell.

rows: {@spell Plane Shift|XPHB} (Only while at a place of great connection to the target plane.)
{@spell Gate|XPHB} (Only while at a place of great connection to the target plane.)

entries: {@bold Bound to this plane.} While holding the Scepter of Orr you cannot be transported to a different plane against your will. You automatically lose your attunement to the Scepter if you travel to a different plane, and the Scepter stays behind.

item.name: Key of Madness
entries: The very fabric of reality seems to shift and bend around this oddly shaped key. It has bulbous orange head, reminiscent of a pumpkin. A terrifying face is carved into it.

While attuned to the key you can use an action to cast the {@spell Knock|XPHB} spell by touching the locked object with the head of the key and saying 'Mad King Thorn says, open!', in which case the knocking sound of the spell is replaced by the disembodied laughter of Mad King Thorn. Each time you do so you take {@dice 1d12} psychic damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Charisma saving throw or be affected by a short term madness. (See the 2014 DMG, page 258)

{@bold Cursed.} After a attuning to the item the creature gains a random short-term madness. If they stay attuned for at least 3 days they gain a random long-term madness. If they stay attuned for over a week they gain an indefinite madness until 1 day after they lose their attunement. While afflicted by any madness they do not want to separate from the item or un-attune from it. A {@spell Remove Curse|XPHB} of {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell removes the attunement to the item and the desire to stay close to it, but it does not remove the madness. Only a wish spell can end them early.

item.name: Herbshivers' Backroom
entries: This small, unassuming brass key has an Edelweiß engraved on it's head.
While attuned to the key, you can use an action to cast the {@spell Demiplane|XPHB} spell with the following changes:
- It always connects to the same demiplane.
- Only people you designate when casting the spell can enter.

- The demiplane created by this spell is a series of 30-foot rooms, each filled with everything needed to grow one specific kind of plant, as decided by you when casting the spell. To successfully create a room suitable for a plant, you must bring at least one sample of the plant and be able to describe the desired room. To travel between rooms, you have to use the key inside the demiplane and visualize or vocalize the desired room.
- The demiplane also contains a large storage space, which automatically expands if more storage is needed, and an alchemical lab, which has everything needed to create potions.
- Anything taken from the demiplane that was not brought there from the outside, grown inside, or created in the lab, turns to dust when trying to leave with it.
If you lose the key, or it gets stolen, it magically teleports itself into a pocket on your person 30 minutes later.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...25...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Pain makes a number of pain attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Pain
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + Spell Level}) force damage.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit who dies after 30...126...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...21...25 Health.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Bloodsong makes a number of bloodsong attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Bloodsong
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + Spell Level}) necrotic damage, the Spirit of Bloodsong regains health equal to the damage dealt.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit who dies after 30...126...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...21...25 Health.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Dissonance makes a number of Dissonance attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Dissonance
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + Spell Level}) force damage, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC, or miss with their next attack until the end of their next turn.

Nature Rituals are a type of rituals unique to the ranger profession. These skills summon a spirit that provides a global effect to all those in its area of effect. Unlike Binding Rituals, Nature Rituals affect everyone in their range, enemies and allies alike.
The Nature Ritual spirits resemble miniature druids from the Maguuma Jungle and Melandru's Watcher, the avatar of Melandru, the patron goddess of rangers.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone horror makes a number of Swipe attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Swipe
entries: Natural Weapon: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 3} + Spell Level) bludgeoning damage.
Bone Horrors are minions created by certain Necromancer skills (Animate Bone Horror, Malign Intervention, and Aura of the Lich) and the Minion Apocalypse Flux.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone fiend makes a number of Spike attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atk} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 80/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3} + Spell Level) piercing damage.
Bone Horrors are minions created by certain Necromancer skills (Animate Bone Horror, Malign Intervention, and Aura of the Lich) and the Minion Apocalypse Flux.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

trait.name: Recuperation
entries: Any creature, who is not a Summoning Ritual, friendly to the creature who summoned the spirit regains hit points equal to the level of the spell at the start of their turn if they are within 150-feet of the spirit and have at least 1 hit point.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...5...6 second[s]. This spirit dies after 30 second[s].

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Shadowsong makes a number of Shadowsong attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Shadowsong
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + Spell Level}) necrotic damage, the target is {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

trait.name: Union
entries: Any creature who takes damage, who is not a Summoning Ritual, who is friendly to the creature who summoned the spirit and while they are within 150-feet of the spirit can roll a number of d4s equal to the spell level and subtract the number rolled from the damage. This spirit then takes necrotic damage equal to damage subtracted.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem can't shape-shift.

trait.name: Necrotic Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to Necrotic damage, it regains a number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the Necrotic damage dealt instead of taking damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes a number of Slam attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m}  your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4 + Spell Level}) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Necrotic damage.
A Flesh Golem is a minion created using Animate Flesh Golem.
Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...94...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.

action.name: Preservation
entries: Choose one creature that you can see within 150-feet. The target regains hit points equal to a number of {@dice d6} equal to two times the Spell Level + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Elite Signet. Create 3 level 1...10...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...17...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Anger makes a number of pain attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Pain
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + Spell Level}) force damage.
Elite Signet. Create 3 level 1...10...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...17...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Hate makes a number of pain attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Pain
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + Spell Level}) force damage.
Elite Signet. Create 3 level 1...10...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...17...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Suffering makes a number of pain attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Pain
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + Spell Level}) force damage.
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...25...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Spirit of Wanderlust makes a number of Wanderlust attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down, minimum 1).

action.name: Wanderlust
entries: {@atk rs} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 90/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + Spell Level}) force damage, if the target did not willingly move on its last turn, it is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Bring down the Punishment
entries: The Spirit of Wanderlust cannot have disadvantage on ranged attacks because a creature is {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone horror makes a number of Bite attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Bite
entries: Natural Weapon: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 3} + Spell Level) piercing damage, you regain health equal to the piercing damage dealt.

Vampiric Horrors are minions created by the Animate Vampiric Horror spell. When one of them does damage, the creature who controls them is healed by the same amount. Vampiric Horrors will not provide healing if they are masterless.

feat.name: Arcane Assassin
entries: You have gained the uncanny ability to extract arcane energy from your victims.
Once per combat, you regain your highest expended level spell slot when you land a Critical Hit.

feat.name: Vengeance of the Protector
entries: Nothing infuriates you more than a friend in need.
While a party member of yours is at 0 hit points, you have a 1d4 bonus on all melee attack rolls against hostile creatures within 150-feet of that party member.

feat.name: Omen of Prophecy
entries: This feat replaces your Cosmic Omen feature.
You have gained a more profound insight into the movement of the cosmos and can therefore influence the future more reliably.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can consult your Star Map for omens and make an Insight check. Until you finish your next Long Rest, you gain access to a special Reaction based on whether you rolled an even or an odd number on the die. If you rolled a natural 20 or a 30+ on your Insight check, you gain access to both (Weal and Woe) and the omen becomes stronger (see the values in parentheses):
Weal (even). Whenever a creature you can see within 30 (60) feet of you is about to make a D20 Test, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d6 (1d12) and add the number rolled to the total.
Woe (odd). Whenever a creature you can see within 30 (60) feet of you is about to make a D20 Test, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d6 (1d12) and subtract the number rolled from the total.
You can use this Reaction a number of times equal to (twice) your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

spell.name: Keystone Signet
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Activate the ancient Keystone Signet, recharging most of your signets and giving them extra power.
You regain all expended uses of your signets which require you to finish a short rest or exit initiative, except {@spell Keystone Signet|GuildWars}.

For the duration, when you target a hostile creature with a signet, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a new target takes {@dice 2d12} psychic damage and can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a new target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Keystone Signet

Elite Signet. All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next 0...5...6 time[s] you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take 15...51...60 damage and are interrupted.

spell.name: Gash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You wound your enemy grievously.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and, if the target is {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Gash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Wild Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Unblockable}
You imbue your weapon with as much magical power as possible, striking with all your might.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's critical effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any stance on the target ends.
You lose all adrenaline.
Wild Blow
Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Flare
entries: Send out a searing hot flare.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

{@bold Overcast:} On a hit, each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Flare
Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...56...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Frenzy
entries: {@bold Stance}
Enter a frenzy, disregarding any defense.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you take 50% more damage.
Frenzy
Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bane Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of making an attack roll.

Choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} radiant damage, is knocked {@condition prone} and the attack roll misses. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Bane Signet
Signet. Target foe takes 26...50...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Banish
entries: You reach out your hand and fire a blinding bolt of divine energy.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
If the target is a summoned creature or an undead, you have advantage on the attack roll, and on a hit, it takes an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Banish
Spell. Target foe takes 20...49...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.

spell.name: Death Nova
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Enchant a friendly creature to explode on death, damaging and {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupting} everything around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, if the creature drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the creature and then target each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a new target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage and is {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d4} damage. On a successful save, a new target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the corrupted condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Death Nova
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26...85...100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Deathly Swarm
entries: You send out a swarm of undead locusts.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 30 feet of the target. Make a new attack roll with disadvantage against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

components.m: a jar filled with dirt and plants

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Deathly Swarm
Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30...78...90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

spell.name: Empathy
entries: {@bold Hex}
Increase the empathy of an enemy to an unnatural degree.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save when the target makes an attack roll, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage and when the target makes a damage roll, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Empathy
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...46...55 damage and deals 1...12...15 less damage.

spell.name: Fire Storm (Guild Wars)
entries: Conjure a storm of fiery bolts, which rain down from the sky.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Fire Storm
Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Backfire
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create an arcane feedback loop in the mind of one creature, causing their spells to become volatile.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage per spell slot level.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Backfire
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...119...140 damage.

spell.name: Lightning Javelin
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Conjure a lighting javelin in your hand and throw it in a straight line, passing through all creatures along its path to its target.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage.
This attack ignores cover provided by other creatures.

On a hit, target each creature, other than you and the target, on the line between you and the target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a javelin and a piece of fleece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lightning Javelin

Spell. Send out a Lightning Javelin that strikes for 15...43...50 lightning damage if it hits. Lightning Javelin interrupts attacking foes. This spell has 25% armor penetration and strikes all foes between you and your target.

spell.name: Meteor
entries: {@bold Overcast:} 5
Summon a meteor to crash down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage or the fire damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Meteor
Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down.

spell.name: Retribution
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Wreath yourself or an ally in retaliatory holy light, which punishes all those who harm you.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, target the creature that dealt the damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 50% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 10). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Retribution
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...17...20 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rodgort's Invocation
entries: Invoke the hellish flames of Rodgort.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 20d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 4d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

components.m: the scale of a red dragon

entries: Rodgort's Invocation
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 15...99...120 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Read the Wind
entries: {@bold Preparation}
You focus your bond with nature to get insight into the air currents and the wind.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage and when you make an attack roll with a ranged weapon, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll.

components.m: a stick and a piece of string

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage and attack roll bonus each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Read the Wind
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...9...10 extra damage.

spell.name: Shielding Hands
entries: {@bold Enchantment} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Envelop a friendly creature in spectral shielding hands, guarding them from damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability.

components.m: half a dozen bushels of wool

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Shielding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...15...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...41...50 Health.

spell.name: Orison of Healing
entries: You invigorate one friendly creature with the soothing rays of dawn.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Orison of Healing
Spell. Heal target ally for 20...60...70 Health.

spell.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Twist the fate around one friendly creature, healing them instead of harming them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage and the target regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Reversal of Fortune
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...67...80.

spell.name: Healing Breeze
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
You invoke a divine healing breeze around one friendly creature you can see, healing them over time.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Healing Breeze
Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Infuse Health
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 50% (Current)
You sacrifice some of your health to mend another creature's injuries.
Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to 100% of the health sacrificed.

m.text: a drop of your own blood, a needle and a water skin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.
Infuse Health
Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...129...136% of the amount you lost.

spell.name: Symbol of Wrath
entries: Sear a holy symbol of wrath on the surrounding ground, smiting all hostile creatures around you.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary Cylinder at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, in that Cylinder must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder to your location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Symbol of Wrath
Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...27...32 holy damage each second.
Kirin's Wrath
Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...27...32 holy damage each second.

spell.name: Animate Bone Horror
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Bone Horror.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars}.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another bone horror this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Horror
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror.

spell.name: Blood Reneawl
entries: {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 15%
Use some of your own blood in a ritual of renewal.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + spellcasting ability modifier.

components.m: a pinte of blood, a needle and a bag

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Blood Renewal
Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you gain +3...5...6 Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain 40...160...190 Health.

spell.name: Faintheartedness
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a creature with faintheartedness making them slower and deteriorating them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per slot level above 1st.
Faintheartedness
Hex Spell. For the next 3...13...16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

spell.name: Life Siphon
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create a tether of life essence between you and another creature, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Siphon
Hex Spell. For 12...22...24 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Soul Barbs
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a target to suffer each time they are targeted by another spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, if the target is the target of a {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell, the target takes {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Barbs
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 15...27...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.

spell.name: Vampiric Gaze
entries: Stare into the soul of a creature, stealing some of their life essence.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Vampiric Gaze
Spell. Steal up to 18...52...60 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Vampiric Touch (Guild Wars)
entries: Siphon the life energy of the creature you touch.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Vampiric Touch
Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29...65...74 Health.

spell.name: Lava Font
entries: Create fissures around you, which spew out lava, melting everything within range.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary Cylinder at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder to your location.
{@bold Overcast:} The radius of the spell increases by 5 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lava Font

Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location where this spell was cast are struck for 5...41...50 fire damage each second. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby foes instead of adjacent ones.

spell.name: Ether Feast
entries: Siphon the energy of a creature to heal yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, you regain hit points equal to four times the initiative lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Ether Feast
Spell. Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed 20...56...65 for each point of Energy lost.

spell.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Lesser Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cyclone Axe

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: Imbue your weapon with magical force, to strike everyone around you.
Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Cyclone Axe
Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Executioner's Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8
You strike with extreme ferocity, attempting a killing blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d10} damage.
Executioner's Strike
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Hammer Bash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You put your entire weight into an extremely heavy blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Hammer Bash
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Sever Artery

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You attempt to make your enemy bleed out.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Sever Artery
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds, losing Health over time.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Power Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: You infuse your next projectile with deadly force.
On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6 + 10} force damage.
Power Shot
Bow Attack. If Power Shot hits, target foe takes 25...45...50 damage. .

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10 + 5} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Aura of Restoration
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
You envelop yourself in a restorative aura, which cycles your spell energy to heal yourself.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level.
Aura of Restoration
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

components.m: a pouch of mixed seeds and a pinte of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blinding Flash
entries: Conjure an extremely bright flash of light right in front of a creature's eyes.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Blinding Flash
Spell. Target foe is Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Conjure Phantasm
entries: {@bold Hex}
Conjure an illusory phantasm in a creature's mind, tormenting it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d10} psychic damage.
Conjure Phantasm
Hex Spell. For 2...13...16 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Imagined Burden
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create the illusion of heavy weight.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is halved.
Imagined Burden
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shatter Delusions
entries: Shatter a harmful spell on a creature to deal damage to everyone around it.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell of 1st level or higher on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, target each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.
Shatter Delusions
Spell. Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex was removed, that foe and all adjacent foes takes 15...63...75 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Signet
entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Focus on healing yourself, leaving you exposed.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
For the duration, you have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Healing Signet
Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

spell.name: Comfort Animal
entries: {@bold Companion}
You comfort a friendly animal with a soothing word and a reassuring gesture.
Choose one companion that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spell casting ability modifier.

Alternatively, you touch a companion that has died within the last minute. The companion returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a companion that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a companion {@condition charmed} by it.
Comfort Animal

Skill. You heal your animal companion for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...48...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dual Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: You duplicate your next projectile.
Make two ranged weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Dual Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 25% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Ignite Arrows
entries: {@bold Preparation}
Tip your arrows with explosives.
For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} fire damage to all creatures in a 5-foot radius around the attack target.
Ignite Arrows
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows explode on contact, dealing 3...15...18 fire damage to target and all adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Point Blank Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon within a quarter of the range increments of the weapon

entries: You shoot an enemy point-blank.
You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is within 5-feet of you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d6} damage.

At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage to the target on a hit ({@dice 2d6}). This damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
Point Blank Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...34...40 damage.
Zojun's Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that has half the normal range, but strikes for +10...34...40 damage.

spell.name: Troll Unguent
entries: You apply some healing troll unguent to yourself.
For the duration at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} hit points.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Troll Unguent
Skill. For 13 seconds, you gain +3...9...10 Health regeneration.

components.m: a mixture of herbs, swamp water and love

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disrupting Chop

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Disrupting Chop
Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Kindle Arrows
entries: {@bold Preparation}
Ignite your arrows.
For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal fire damage and deal an additional {@damage 1d4} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Kindle Arrows
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows deal fire damage and hit for an additional 3...20...24 fire damage.

spell.name: Judge's Insight
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Enchantment}
Imbue a creature with holy energy, and give them insight into their enemies defenses.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal radiant damage and gain the Armor Penetration property.
Judge's Insight
Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target ally's attacks deal holy damage and have +20% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Enfeebling Blood
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%
Corrupt some of your own blood, to weaken an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enfeebling Blood
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Epidemic
entries: Make your enemies conditions contagious.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than the chosen target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of each harmful condition on the chosen target.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Epidemic
Spell. Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enervating Charge
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Fire a jolt of electricity, weakening on hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 5d6} lightning damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enervating Charge
Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...45...50 lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Wary Stance

time.condition: which you take when you are the target of a spell which requires a melee attack roll

entries: {@bold Stance}
You enter a stance, to block any incoming melee spell.

For the duration, if you are the target of a spell which requires a melee attack roll, the attack roll misses you, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4} and you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenalin.
Wary Stance
Stance. For 1...5...6 second[s], you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Predator's Pounce
entries: {@bold Companion}
Command your companion to attempt a Predator's Pounce.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage, and the beast regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Predator's Pounce
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Predator's Pounce that deals +5...29...35 damage. If that attack hits, your animal companion gains 5...41...50 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Restore Life
entries: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. The target returns to life with 40% of their maximum hit points. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Restore Life
Spell. Touch the body of a fallen party member. Target party member is returned to life with 20...56...65% Health and 42...80...90% Energy.

components.m: gems worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the % increases by 10%  for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Insidious Parasite
entries: {@bold Hex}
You magically implant a life sucking parasite.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target succeeds on an attack roll, the target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Insidious Parasite
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe hits with an attack, you steal up to 15...39...45 Health from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Physical Resistance
entries: {@bold Stance}
Enhance your physical defense at the cost of becoming vulnerable to elemental damage.
For the duration, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage, but have vulnerability to acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, and thunder damage.
Physical Resistance
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against physical damage, but you lose 24...14...12 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Immolate
entries: Ignite a creature with searing flames.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Immolate
Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...64...75 fire damage and is set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Hunter's Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: Fire a well aimed shot to make a creature bleed.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Hunter's Shot
Bow Attack. If this attack hits, your target bleeds for 3...21...25 seconds.

spell.name: Heal Area
entries: Heal every creature in an area around you.
Target each creature within a 10-foot Emanation. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Heal Area
Spell. Heal yourself and all adjacent creatures for 30...150...180 points.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dark Pact
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%
Call upon a dark force, sacrificing blood to inflict harm.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d4} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 6d4}), 11th level ({@dice 8d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 10d4}).
Dark Pact
Spell. Deal 10...40...48 shadow damage to target foe.

components.m: a drop of your own blood and a half dozen candles

spell.name: Chaos Storm
entries: Conjure a storm of chaotic energy, harming and draining the energy from an area for multiple rounds.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot Cube centered on that point. Each creature in that Cube must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. Choose one of the d8s. The number rolled on that die determines the spell's damage type, as shown below.
If you roll the same number on two or more d8s, a target's initiative gets reduced by the number.
