entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, the adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Predatory Bond
entries: {@bold Companion}
Form a bond with a companion, imbuing it with unnatural speed and siphoning health with its attacks.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. For the duration, the companion can attack one additional time when it takes the attack action on its turn and when the target hits with an attack, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Predatory Bond
Shout. For 5...17...20 seconds, your animal companion attacks 25% faster and heals you for 1...25...31 Health with each successful attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Draw Spirit
entries: Beckon an allied spirit to your location, relocating it.
Target one friendly summoning ritual that you can see within range. The target gets teleported within 5 feet of you to an unoccupied space.
The number of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Draw Spirit
Spell. Teleport target allied spirit to your location.

spell.name: Summon Spirits
entries: Summon all allied spirits to your location, relocating and healing them.
Target each friendly summoning rituals that you can see within range. A target gets teleported within 5 feet of you to an unoccupied space and regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Summon Spirits
Spell. All spirits you control Shadow Step to your location, and gain 60...100 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Lead the Way!
entries: Shout "Lead the way", encouraging a party member to blaze the way forward.
Choose one friendly creature that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target's speed is increased by 25%.
The duration increases by 1 round for each ally within range.
"Lead the Way!"
Shout. Target ally moves 25% faster for 1...4...5 seconds for each ally within earshot (maximum of 20 seconds).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration for each ally increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Fall Back!
entries: Command your allies to "Fall Back!" increasing their movement speed and healing them if they move.

Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, a target's speed is increased by 33% and if a target takes the dash action or moves at least 30 feet while affected by this spell, they regain Hit Points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
When a target makes an attack roll, this spell ends on that target.
"Fall Back!"

Shout. For 4...9...10 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 5...13...15 Health per second while moving and move 33% faster. "Fall Back!" ends on an ally affected by this shout when that ally successfully hits with an attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: The Power Is Yours!
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Elite}
Motivate your allies to act more quickly, increasing their initiative.
Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, at the start of each target's turns, a target's initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
"The Power Is Yours!"
Elite Shout. For 3 seconds, all allies within earshot gain 0...1...1 Energy regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Heart of Fury
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Stance}
Wreath your heart in divine fury, increasing your attack speed.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
Heart of Fury
Stance. For 2...8...10 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Mystic Regeneration
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Create a magical connection to the rejuvenating properties of the earth to heal yourself for each spell on you every turn.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per beneficial spell on you.
Mystic Regeneration
Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, you have +1...3...4 Health regeneration for each enchantment (maximum of 8) on you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Guiding Hands
entries: {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Unblockable}
Let the wind guide your hands to strike true.
End the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition on yourself.
For the duration, your next three attacks have the {@bold Unblockable} property.
Guiding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, your next 0...2...3 attack[s] cannot be blocked. When activated, this skill removes the Blindness condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks this spell effects increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Victorious Sweep

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: Gloat in your victory over a creature, gaining health if you have more health than them.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and if you have more hit points than the target, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d8}.
Victorious Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...21...25 damage. If target foe has less Health than you, you gain 30...70...80 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit and the healing increases each by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Yeti Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
Smash the ground like a yeti, knocking down adjacent creatures who are suffering from a condition.

Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is suffering from a condition, must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Yeti Smash
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. Attack all adjacent foes. If this attack strikes a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Teinai's Heat
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, projecting the legendary heat of the Canthan hero Teinai.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. Each non-chosen creature takes {@damage 4d4} fire damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. Additionally, non-chosen creatures, who are in the spell's area and are {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened}, can take either an action or a Bonus Action, not both, and can make only one attack if they take the Attack action.
Teinai's Heat

Ward Spell. Place a ward of Teinai's Heat at your location for 10...14...15 seconds. Foes within the ward suffer 2...4...5 health [sic] degeneration. Weakened foes attack 33% slower. This skill is disabled for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Teinai's Wind
entries: Conjure up the twin winds of Teinai, chilling and potentially disrupting and immolating {@condition burning|GuildWars} creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage. If a target was {@condition burning|GuildWars}, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d8} fire damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Teinai's Wind
Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 10...34...40 cold damage. Burning foes struck by Teinai's Wind take an additional 40...72...80 damage and are interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the cold damage and the fire damage increases by {@dice 1d6} and {@dice 1d8} respectively for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Death Blossom

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Dual Attack}
Create a blossom of death, by making your weapons dance through your foes.

Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target and all other creatures other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target suffer the weapon attack's normal effects and take {@damage 1d6} damage.
Death Blossom
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for +20...40...45 damage and all adjacent foes take 20...40...45 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Flesh of My Flesh
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 50% (Current)
Sacrifice some of your own vitality to resurrect a creature.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with hit points equal to 100% of the health sacrificed. On the target's next turn, the target can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
Flesh of My Flesh
Spell. Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and 5...17...20% Energy.

components.m: a diamond worth 300+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Death's Charge
entries: Quickly step into the shadow of the ethereal plane, to teleport next to a creature and heal if you are weaker than them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. If the target has more hit points than you do, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Death's Charge
Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. If that foe has more Health than you, you are healed for 65...173...200.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Generous Was Tsungrai
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%, {@bold Urn}
Create a golden urn containing the ashes of Tsungrai, increasing your health while holding them, and healing yourself when you drop them.
You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 4d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
When you drop this urn, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 4d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Generous Was Tsungrai
Item Spell. Hold Tsungrai's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds and gain +50...122...140 maximum Health. When you drop his ashes, you gain 100...244...280 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 3rd and the healing increases by {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Entangling Asp

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@bold Off-Hand Attack}
Transform your weapon into a deadly asp temporarily, which strikes a foe, knocking them {@condition prone} and {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupting} them.

On a hit, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and is {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Entangling Asp
Spell. Entangling Asp must follow a lead attack. Target foe is knocked down and becomes Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

components.m: the venom of a an asp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Mend Body and Soul
entries: Channel the energy of nearby spirits to heal and cleanse a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} and you end the latest N harmful conditions on the target, where N is the number of friendly summoning rituals within range.
Mend Body and Soul
Spell. Target ally is healed for 20...96...115 Health. That ally loses one condition for each spirit within earshot.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Expunge Enchantments
entries: Hit a creature with an expunging strike, removing beneficial spells.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. Additionally, you cannot cast spells which require an attack roll, except this one, for the duration, and you end additional beneficial spells equal to the spells disabled by this spell.
Expunge Enchantments
Skill. Target foe loses 1 enchantment. All of your other non-attack skills are disabled for 10...6...5 seconds. For each skill disabled in this way, target touched foe loses 1 additional enchantment.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level, the duration decreases to 2 rounds.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration decreases to 1 round.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, one additional spell ends for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Mighty Was Vorizunun
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Urn}
Create a golden urn containing the ashes of Vorizun, granting you improved defenses and spellcasting abilities.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, you gain an additional level 4 spell slot and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Mighty Was Vorizun
Item Spell. Hold Vorizun's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.

components.m: the ashes of a strong creature

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell slot increases by 1 (maximum level 8) for each slot level above 3rd level and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Golden Lotus Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Lead Attack}
Strike with the elegance of the golden lotus, gaining initiative if you are under the effect of an Enchantment.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and if you are under the effect of a beneficial spell, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Golden Lotus Strike
Lead Attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...17...20 damage. If you are under the effects of an Enchantment, you gain 5...7...8 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Pain
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Pain|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Pain to your will, dealing heavy damage health with its attacks.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Pain|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Pain
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit's attacks deal 5...25...30 damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

spell.name: Iron Palm

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Lead Attack}, {@bold Unblockable}
Strike the flat of your weapon into a vital part of a creature, knocking them {@condition prone} if they are suffering from a hex or condition.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d10} damage, and if the target is suffering from a harmful condition and/or under the effect of a detrimental spell the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Iron Palm
Skill. Target touched foe suffers 5...41...50 damage, and if that foe is suffering from a hex or condition that foe is knocked down. Iron Palm counts as a lead attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Painful Bond
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create a painful bond to the spirit realm in a group of creatures, making your summoned spirits appear as loved ones to them, increasing the damage they take from them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, when a target is hit by an attack from a Summoning Ritual, they take {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.
Painful Bond
Hex Spell. For 10...18...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Painful Bond and take 8...18...20 damage whenever hit by a spirit's attack.

components.m: a wedding ring from a widow

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Leaping Mantis Sting

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Lead Attack}
Leap at your target with a precise strike, punishing moving targets.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target willingly moved on its last turn, is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Leaping Mantis Sting
Lead Attack. If Mantis Sting hits, target foe takes +5...13...15 damage. If this attack strikes a moving foe, that foe is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 2d4} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Recuperation
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Recuperation|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Recuperation to your will, healing your allies.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Recuperation|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Recuperation
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. Non-spirit allies within its range gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

spell.name: Nine Tail Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Dual Attack}, {@bold Unblockable}
Quickly make a flurry of faints, strike twice and bypass any defenses.
Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage.
Nine Tail Strike
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. Nine Tail Strike cannot be blocked and strikes for +15...35...40 damage if it hits.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Resilient Weapon
entries: {@bold Weapon Spell}
Temporarily transform a weapon into a resilient weapon, visibly making its appearance more defensive and increasing the wielders' vitality in a time of need.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, while the target is under the effect of a detrimental spell or suffering from at least one harmful condition, the target gains the following effects:
- When the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
- At the start of each of the target's turns, if the target is above 0 hit points, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
Resilient Weapon
Weapon Spell. For 3...10...12 seconds, target ally has a Resilient Weapon. While suffering from a hex or condition, that ally gains +1...5...6 Health regeneration and +24 armor.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Recall (Guild Wars)
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Create a shadowy tether between yourself to an ally of yours, which you can cut at any time to teleport yourself to them.

Choose one willing friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration, when this spell ends, while the two of you are on the same plane of existence, you teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space.
When you teleport this way, you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, or be {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn.
Recall

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain Recall, nothing happens. When Recall ends, you Shadow Step to the ally you targeted when you activated this skill and all of your skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

m.text: a thread woven from gold worth 200+ GP

spell.name: Rupture Soul

entries: Rupture Soul
Spell. Target allied spirit is destroyed. All nearby enemies are struck for 50...122...140 lightning damage and become blinded for 3...10...12 seconds.

components.m: an animal bladder filled with gas and a needle

entries: Violently sever the connection a conjured soul has to the afterlife, sending them back in an explosive flash.

Choose one friendly summoning ritual that you can see within range. The target dies, then you target each other creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shadowsong
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Shadowsong|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Shadowsong to your will, blinding creatures with its attacks.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Shadowsong|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Shadowsong
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. The spirit's attacks deal 5...17...20 damage and cause Blindness for 1...5...6 second[s]. This spirit dies after 30 second[s].

components.m: a poem written by a blind creature

spell.name: Shadow of Haste
entries: {@bold Stance}
Create a shadowy tether to your current location and move quickly away from it, teleporting back to it at the end of the spell.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 15%.
When this spell ends, teleport to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the location you originally cast this spell, if you are still on the same plane of existence and within 10 miles of it.
Shadow of Haste
Stance. For 10...34...40 seconds you move 15% faster than normal. When Shadow of Haste ends, you shadow step to your original location.

m.text: a loadstone worth 100+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Shadow Refuge
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Weave shadows around your body, which rejuvenate you every round and heal you when they dissipate.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends without healing you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Shadow Refuge
Enchantment Spell. For 6 seconds, you gain 5...9...10 Health regeneration. When Shadow Refuge ends, you gain 40...88...100 Health if you are attacking.

spell.name: Spirit Boon Strike
entries: Strike a foe with lightning and channel a portion of the energy to heal your spirits.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Target each friendly summoning ritual that you can see within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Spirit Boon Strike
Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...56...65 lightning damage, and all spirits you control within earshot gain 20...56...65 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Sharpen Daggers
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Magically sharpen your daggers to a supernatural degree, making them inflict {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} with every hit.

For the duration, when you hit a target with a melee weapon attack, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Sharpen Daggers
Enchantment Spell. For 5...25...30 seconds, your dagger attacks cause Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds.

m.text: a whetstone worth 10+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Spirit Light
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 17%
Channel your own life force through the afterlife to heal a creature, preventing the sacrifice if there is a spirit close by.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
If there is at least one friendly summoning ritual within range, you do not sacrifice health to cast this spell.
Spirit Light
Spell. Target ally is healed for 60...156...180. If any spirits are within earshot, you don't sacrifice Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Shroud of Distress
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Let shadow seep from your wounds, protecting and healing you as long as you are below 50% of your health.

For the duration, while you are below 50% of your maximum hit points, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + spellcasting ability modifier.
Shroud of Distress
Enchantment Spell. For 30...54...60 seconds, if you are below 50% Health, you have 3...7...8 health regeneration and a 75% chance to block attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Spirit Rift
entries: Open a temporary rift to another plane at a location, which violently collapses at the start of your next turn.

Choose a point that you can see within range. When this spell ends, each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 12d6} lightning damage and has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, and has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for 1 round.
Spirit Rift
Spell. Open a Spirit Rift at target foe's location. After 3 seconds, all adjacent foes are struck for 25...105...125 lightning damage and suffer from Cracked Armor for 1...16...20 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 5th, and you create an additional rift for every two slot levels above 5th. A creature in the area of more than one rift is affected only once.

spell.name: Signet of Shadows
entries: {@bold Signet:} Initiative
Activate your signet of shadows, plunging a creature into darkness for a brief moment, which is amplified if the creature is {@condition blinded}.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage, and if the target is {@condition blinded}, they take an additional {@damage 6d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Signet of Shadows
Signet. Target foe takes 5...29...35 damage. If your target was Blinded, that foe suffers an additional 15...51...60 damage.

spell.name: Splinter Weapon
entries: {@bold Weapon Spell}
Transform a weapon by giving splinters which fly off in every direction on a hit.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, the next two attacks deal an additional {@damage 2d6} piercing damage to all hostile creatures in a 10-foot radius around the attack target.
Splinter Weapon
Weapon Spell. For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next 1...4...5 attack[s] deal 5...41...50 damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for every two slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Twisting Fangs

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@bold Dual Attack}
Twist your weapons deep into an enemy's vital organs, causing internal ruptures.

Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 3d6} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} and starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
Twisting Fangs
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Twisting Fangs strikes for +10...18...20 damage and struck foe suffers from Bleeding and Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 3r on a hit.

spell.name: Union
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Union|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Union to your will, absorbing damage to your allies.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Union|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Union

Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit ally in its range takes damage or life steal, it is reduced by 15 and the spirit takes 15 damage. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

spell.name: Unsuspecting Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Lead Attack}
Hit your target with a strike in an unexpected location, dealing critical damage if they are at high health.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d4} damage. If the target was above 90% of their maximum hit points, the attack is a critical hit.
Unsuspecting Strike
Lead Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +19...29...31 damage. If your target was above 90% Health you deal an additional 15...63...75 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 2d4} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Vengeful Weapon
entries: {@bold Weapon Spell}
Temporarily transform a weapon into a vengeful weapon, visibly making its appearance more wicked and punishing anyone damaging the wielder.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target takes damage from a creature, target that creature. The new target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage, and the old target regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Vengeful Weapon
Weapon Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally takes damage or life steal from a foe, that ally steals up to 15...51...60 Health from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Way of Perfection
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Achieve perfection through precision.
For the duration, when you score a critical hit, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Way of Perfection
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you successfully land a critical hit, you gain 10...34...40 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Weapon of Warding
entries: {@bold Weapon Spell}
Temporarily transform a weapon into a warding weapon, visibly making its appearance more defensive and increasing the wielders' defenses.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, the target has a +5 bonus to AC and at the start of each of the target's turns, if the target is above 0 hit points, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Weapon of Warding
Weapon Spell. For 3...7...8 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Warding that grants target ally +2...4...4 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shadow Sanctuary
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Blind yourself by entering a shadowy sanctuary, in which your partially protected from damage and heal every turn.

For the duration, you are {@condition blinded}, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage, and at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} hit points.
Shadow Sanctuary
Enchantment Spell. You are Blinded for 5 seconds. For 10 seconds, you gain +7...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd

spell.name: Aura of Holy Might
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Invoke an aura of holy might, which damages all creatures around you every time you lose an enchantment.

For the duration, when a beneficial spell which requires {@status Concentration|XPHB} ends on you, you can target each creature other than you within a 10-foot emanation.  Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Aura of Holy Might
Enchantment Spell. For 45 seconds, you deal 20...25 holy damage to all adjacent foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd

spell.name: Elemental Attunement
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Empower your elemental magic, by attuning to all four elements at once.

For the Duration, when you cast an elemental themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. Additionally, when you would expend a spell slot to cast an elemental themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

components.m: an arrow made of copper chloride

entries: Elemental Attunement

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 25...53...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air, Fire, Water, and Earth and gain +1...2...2 to these attributes. You gain 50% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use magic associated with any of these elements.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Elemental Lord
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Channel the power of an Elemental Lord, arcane magics swirling around you.

For the Duration, when you cast an elemental themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can roll a {@dice d20}. On a 10 or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. Additionally, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level.
Elemental Lord

Enchantment Spell. For 40...60 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for 100...300% of the spell's Energy cost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ether Nightmare
entries: {@bold Hex}
Use the energy in a creature to conjure an ether nightmare, which tortures them with their own energy.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d4} psychic damage per initiative lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Ether Nightmare
Hex Spell. Target foe loses 5...8 Energy. For each point of Energy lost in this way, that foe and all foes in the area suffer -1 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.

spell.name: Selfless Spirit
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Become selfless in the casting of your spells, improving your casting abilities when targeting allies.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 2nd level or higher, that targets a friendly creature, other than yourself, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level lower than required.
Selfless Spirit
Enchantment Spell. For 15...20 seconds, spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Signet of Corruption
entries: {@bold Signet:} Long Rest
Activate your wicked signet of {@condition corruption|GuildWars}, siphoning off spell energy from afflicted creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage and if the target is under the effect of a detrimental spell or suffering from a detrimental condition, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level equal to the number of detrimental spells and conditions on all targets who failed the saving throw (maximum 5).
Signet of Corruption
Signet. Target foe and all nearby foes take 20...30 damage. For each affected foe suffering from a condition or hex, you gain 2 Energy (maximum 12...20 Energy).

spell.name: Spear of Fury

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the thrown property

entries: Let yourself become overwhelmed with fury, throwing out a spear, which rewards you for your brutality by giving you adrenaline if hitting a creature suffering from a condition.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage and, if the target is suffering from a negative condition, you gain {@dice 1d6} strikes of adrenaline.
Spear of Fury
Spear Attack. This attack deals +30...40 damage. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, you gain 3...6 strikes of adrenaline.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Triple Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: You triple your next projectile.
Make three ranged weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, but has resistance against the damage.
Triple Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot 3 arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 40...25% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Save Yourselves!
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8
Heavily increase your group's resilience.
Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, when a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
"Save Yourselves!"
Shout. For 4...6 seconds, all other party members gain +100 armor.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Double Dragon
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure two twin dragons around yourself and an ally, incinerating anything around you two.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, you and the target gain the following benefits:

- At the start of each of your turns, target each creature other than yourself in a 10-foot Emanation. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
- For the duration, when you hit a target with an attack, they must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition burning} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Double Dragon

Elite Enchantment Spell. Invoke the power of the Dragon. For 8 seconds, you and target ally are enchanted with Double Dragon. Adjacent foes are dealt 5...25...30 fire damage each second. Additionally, when you or your ally use skills that target a foe, that foe is set on fire for 0...2...3 second[s].

components.m: the tounge of a red dragon

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Arcane Languor
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Cause incredibly lethargy every time a creature casts a spell by forcing them to see an illusion of the most exhausting thing possible.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target casts a spell, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they gain 5 rounds of {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Arcane Languor
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...8...10 second[s], all spells cast by the target foe cause 10 Overcast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Air of Enchantment
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Invoke the blessed winds of Dwayna around a creature, improving enchantments cast on them.

Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration, any beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell cast on them, of 1st level or higher, can be cast by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
Air of Enchantment
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, enchantments cast on target other ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy).

components.m: a fan and a stick of burning incense

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Animate Flesh Golem
entries: {@bold Elite}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Flesh Golem.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Flesh Golem|GuildWars}.

The {@creature Flesh Golem|GuildWars} remains for the duration, until it reaches zero hit points, you create a new one or you unprepare this spell, at which point it will leave behind an exploitable corpse.

The {@creature Flesh Golem|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies. The {@creature Flesh Golem|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Flesh Golem|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block.
Animate Flesh Golem
Elite Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 3...21...25 Flesh Golem. The Flesh Golem leaves an exploitable corpse. You can have only one Flesh Golem at a time.

spell.name: Archer's Signet
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Initiative
Activate your signet bestowed upon you by the goddess of nature herself, greatly increasing the potency of your conditions.

For the duration, while wielding a ranged weapon, any harmful condition you inflict has their duration doubled, and creatures have disadvantage on saving throws to resist your effects which apply conditions or to get rid of them.
Archer's Signet
Elite Signet. For 1...19...24 second[s], conditions you apply while wielding a bow last 100% longer.

spell.name: Attuned Was Songkai

entries: Attuned Was Songkai
Elite Item Spell. Hold Songkai's ashes for up to 45 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your spells and binding rituals cost -5...41...50% of the base Energy to cast.

components.m: the ashes of a creature who died while communing with a god

entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Urn}
Conjure the golden urn of the legendary High Priestess Songkai, who is said to have reached enlightenment, empowering your spell with divine power.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d12} levels higher than the one used in the casting.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 10th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 9th.

spell.name: Coward!
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Elite}
Insult someone for not standing their ground so hard they are knocked {@condition prone}.
Choose one creature that can hear you within range. If the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
"Coward!"
Elite Shout. If target foe is moving, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Assassin's Promise
entries: {@bold Elite}
Pen a magical contract to eliminate a creature, getting a reward upon it being fulfilled.
Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends, and you gain the following benefits:
- Your initiative, if in combat, gets increased by {@dice 1d12}. Otherwise, you can add {@dice 1d12} to your next initiative roll within the next 24 hours.
- You learn the location of where the creature is, and who/what reduced it to 0 hit points.
- If that location is on the same plane of existence, you can use your reaction to teleport within 5 feet of the target.
- As part of the same reaction, or if you chose not to teleport, as its own reaction, you can cast a spell of 4th level or lower without expending a spell slot.
Destroying the contract ends the spell. You can only have one of these contracts at a time, if you create a new one, the old gets destroyed. Ending the spell destroys the contract.
Assassin's Promise
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, if target foe dies, you gain 5...17...20 Energy and all your skills are recharged.

m.text: a scroll of parchment and ink worth 200+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd and the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d12} each for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Energy Boon
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Bestow upon yourself and an ally an arcane boon, boosting your initiative and vitality.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. You and the target gain the following benefits:
- Your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d8}.
- For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 1 per 1 initiative you have.
Energy Boon

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, Energy Boon raises the maximum Health of you and target ally by 1...3...3 for each point of your respective maximum Energy. When this enchantment is first applied, you and your target gain 1...10...12 Energy. You gain an additional 1 Energy for every 2 points you have in Energy Storage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Expel Hexes
entries: {@bold Elite}
Safely expel two hexes from a creature, by bending the weave around them.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest two harmful spells on the target ends.
Expel Hexes
Elite Spell. Remove up to 2 Hexes from target ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blessed Light
entries: {@bold Elite}
Shine down the blessed light of the gods on a creature, ailing them of hurt and malediction.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier, and you end the latest harmful spell and the latest harmful condition on the target.
Blessed Light
Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 10...114...140 Health and remove one condition and one hex.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cultist's Fervor
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Whip yourself into a fervor, by using a ceremonial dagger to carve eldritch runes in your flesh, which empower your spellcasting.
For the duration, you start {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
For the duration, when you cast a necromancy themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d4} level higher than the one used in the casting.
Cultist's Fervor

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds and 3 seconds longer for every rank of Soul Reaping, your Necromancer spells cost -1...5...6 Energy to cast but you suffer from Bleeding for 10 seconds each time you cast a Necromancer spell.

m.text: a ceremonial dagger worth 300+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Broad Head Arrow

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: {@bold Elite}
Fire a broad head arrow, which flies slower, but dazes creatures on impact.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within the first range increment of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell fails and has no effect.
Broad Head Arrow
Elite Bow Attack. You shoot a broad head arrow that moves slower than normal. If it hits, target foe is Dazed for 5...17...20 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell that spell is interrupted.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Clamor of Souls
entries: {@bold Elite}
Create a cacophony of gibbering souls in an area, discharging their pent-up frustration.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
If you are holding an object created by a spell or if there is at least one friendly summoning ritual within range, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Clamor of Souls
Elite Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 10...54...65 lightning damage. If you are within earshot of a spirit or holding a bundle item, you gain 10 Energy.

m.text: a golden bell blessed by a priest, worth 100+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Auspicious Parry
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 1, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Get ready to block an attack, and have an adrenaline rush when this stance ends.
For the duration, the next time you are attacked, the attack misses and this spell ends.
When this spell ends, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of Adrenaline.
Auspicious Parry
Elite Stance. For 8 seconds, the next attack against you is blocked. You gain 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline when this stance ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Aura of Displacement
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Shadow step to a creature, leaving behind a faint glowing aura, which allows you to teleport back.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. When this spell ends, teleport to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the location you originally cast this spell, if you are still on the same plane of existence and within 1000 feet of it.
Aura of Displacement
Elite Enchantment Spell. When you cast Aura of Displacement, Shadow Step to target foe. When you stop maintaining Aura of Displacement you return to your original location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the range restriction of the spell increases by 1000 feet for each slot level above 2nd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you do not need to be on the same plane of existence to teleport back.

spell.name: Gust
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure the breath of twin air elementals around you and an ally.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, you and the target gain the following benefits:
- For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%.

- Target each creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} cold damage and, if a target attacked on its last turn, is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Gust

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, both you and target ally move 33% faster. When you cast this spell, all foes near you and your target take 15...59...70 cold damage. Foes struck by Gust while attacking or moving are knocked down.

components.m: the bottled breath of an air elemental

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Lyssa's Aura
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Invoke the power of the goddess of beauty and illusions.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 12 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
When you cast a spell, the duration of this spell resets.
Lyssa's Aura
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, you have +0...4...5 Energy regeneration. This enchantment reapplies itself every time you cast a spell on a foe.

m.text: a statue of Lyssa, worth 300+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Boon Signet
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
The next spell you cast that targets only one creature and heals them, heals them for twice the amount.
Boon Signet
Elite Signet. Heal target ally for 20...68...80 Health. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer [sic] spell that targets an ally heals for an additional 20...68...80 Health.

spell.name: Discord
entries: {@bold Elite}
Sow discord in a creature's mind, by amplifying it's already present suffering.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the target is suffering from a negative condition and is under the effect of a detrimental spell, the target takes {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 3d12}), 11th level ({@dice 4d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 5d12}).
Discord
Elite Spell. If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers 30...94...110 damage.

spell.name: Enraged Lunge
entries: {@bold Companion}, {@bold Elite}
Command your companion to attempt an Enraged Lunge, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} on a hit.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enraged Lunge
Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts an Enraged Lunge that applies a Deep Wound to target foe for 5...17...20 seconds and deals +10...42...50 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Consume Soul
entries: {@bold Elite}
Siphon off the life force of a creature, attempting to destroy all summoned creatures in an area.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Then, if you hit, target each summoned creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on the target. Each new target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
Consume Soul
Elite Spell. You steal 5...49...60 Health from target foe. All hostile summoned creatures in the area of that foe take 25...105...125 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Beguiling Haze
entries: {@bold Elite}
Conjure a beguiling haze around a creature, while teleporting to them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Beguiling Haze
Elite Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. That foe becomes Dazed for 3...8...9 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 15 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mirror of Ice
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Summon two mirrors of ice around yourself and an ally, then shatter them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. You and the target are both the origin of the following effect:

- Target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
If you damage a creature already under the effect of a detrimental water themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On an 11 or higher, this spell does not expend a spell slot.
Mirror of Ice

Elite Hex Spell. Shatter a Mirror of Ice. All foes near you and target ally take 15...59...70 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds. If you strike a foe hexed with Water Magic, Mirror of Ice recharges 50% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Power Leech

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Violently interrupt the casting of a spell by implanting a psychic leech.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level and your initiative gets increased by the amount lost.
Power Leech
Elite Hex Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 10 seconds, whenever that foe casts a spell, you steal up to 5...13...15 Energy from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the final reduction in initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Empathic Removal
entries: {@bold Elite}
Relive the burden of yourself and an ally.

Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. You and the target regain 5 hit points, and you end the latest harmful spell and the latest harmful condition on yourself and the target.
Empathic Removal
Elite Spell. You and target other ally lose 1 condition and 1 hex, and are healed for 50.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Icy Veins
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Rapidly freeze a creature's insides, making them explode when they die.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage.

Additionally, for the duration, if the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the target and then target each other hostile creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a new target takes {@damage 6d6} cold damage. On a successful save, a new target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Icy Veins
Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...74...90 cold damage. For 10...30...35 seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for 20...92...110 cold damage.

spell.name: Equinox
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of equinox, draining spell casters of energy when they cast spells.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and casts a spell, a creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, they gain 2 rounds of {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Equinox
Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Spells cast within its range that cause Overcast cause an additional 10 Overcast. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Defiant Was Xinrae
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Urn}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Xinrae, protecting you from large impacts, and siphoning off health when you drop it.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, when you would take damage, if that damage would be more than 20% of your maximum hit points, reduce the damage to 20% of your maximum hit points.

When you drop this urn, target each hostile creature within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. You regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Defiant Was Xinrae

Elite Item Spell. Hold Xinrae's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. When you drop her ashes, you steal 5...41...50 Health from all nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dragon Slash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 10, {@bold Elite}
Channel the dragon of the canthan empire, striking with the ferocity of a dragon's claw.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d10} damage, and you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline.
Dragon Slash
Elite Sword Attack. If Dragon Slash hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage and gain 1...4...5 strike[s] of adrenaline.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d10} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Dark Apostasy
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Sever a creatures' connection to reality on a critical strike.
For the duration, when you score a critical hit against a target, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends.
Dark Apostasy

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...14...17 seconds, every time you successfully land a critical hit, you remove one enchantment from your target. If you remove an enchantment in this way, you lose 10...5...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.

spell.name: Ride the Lightning (Guild Wars)

entries: Ride the Lightning

Elite Spell. You Ride the Lightning to target. All adjacent foes are Blinded for 1...4...5 second[s]. If your target is a foe, it is struck for 10...58...70 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

components.m: a lute strung with metal strings

entries: {@bold Elite}
Transform yourself into a lightning bolt, instantly transporting yourself and exploding in a blinding flash.

Choose an unoccupied space that you can see within range. Teleport to that space, and each creature of your choice in a 10-Emination must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d8} lightning damage and is {@condition blinded} for the duration. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd and the range of the spell increases by 50 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Psychic Distraction

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@bold Elite}
Cause a momentary distraction in a creature's mind, potentially interrupting their action and making them unable to use it again for a short while.
For the duration, you cannot cast spells other than {@spell Psychic Distraction|GuildWars} or use any abilities.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/abilities dissipates with no effect, the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast/use it is wasted, and the creature cannot use that spell/ability again for the duration. If a spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
Psychic Distraction
Elite Spell. All of your other skills are disabled for 8 seconds. If target foe is using a skill, that skill is interrupted and disabled for an additional 5...11...12 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Burst
entries: {@bold Elite}
Fire a projectile of healing energy, which explodes into a flash of healing energy.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6}. Additionally, each friendly creature, which the target can see, within a 150-foot Emanation centered on the target, regains hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Healing Burst

Elite Spell. Target ally is healed for 10...130...160. All party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus from this spell. Your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.

spell.name: Order of Apostasy
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Order}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%
Induct your allies into the Order of Apostasy, dragging creatures down to their heretical levels by removing their protections.
Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, when a target hits with a weapon attack, the latest beneficial spell on the attack target ends.
Order of Apostasy

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that foe loses one enchantment. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 25...17...15% maximum Health.

components.m: a holy text sullied by demon ichor

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Famine
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a famine, inducing intense pain in any creature starved of energy.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. If a creature starts its turn within 120 feet of the nature spirit, and its initiative is 0 or lower, it takes {@damage 8d6} necrotic damage.
Famine

Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Whenever a non-spirit creature in its range reaches 0 Energy, that creature takes 10...30...35 damage. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Grasping Was Kuurong
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Urn}
