Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Kuurong, releasing her spirit in a whirlwind of energy, when dropping the ashes.

You create an urn in your hands. When you drop this urn, target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d8} lightning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.
Grasping Was Kuurong
Elite Item Spell. Hold Kuurong's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...63...75 damage and knocked down.

components.m: the ashes of a Gulthias Blight

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Enraged Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Elite}
Channel the fury of battle into a devastating smash.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of Adrenaline, and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Enraged Smash
Elite Hammer Attack. If Enraged Smash hits, you gain 1...3...4 strike[s] of adrenaline. If you hit a moving foe, you strike for +10...34...40 damage, and target foe is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Flashing Blades
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Conjure a cloud of daggers around yourself, which block incoming attacks and retaliate at attackers.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if an attack misses you because of this bonus, target the attacking creature. The target takes {@damage 2d6} slashing damage.
Flashing Blades
Elite Stance. For 5...25...30 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks while attacking. If you block an attack in this way, your attacker takes 5...17...20 damage.

m.text: a dagger worth 2+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Second Wind
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Gain a second wind by redistributing your Overcast.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per round of Overcast on you, and your initiative gets increased by 1 per round of Overcast.
Second Wind
Elite Spell. You gain 1 Energy and 5 Health for each point of Energy restricted by Overcast. You lose all enchantments.

spell.name: Psychic Instability

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@bold Elite}
Interrupt a foe and create a psychic shockwave on a success, knocking creatures {@condition prone}.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, each hostile creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes is knocked {@condition prone}.
To stand up from {@condition prone}, a target must first succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or waste its movement in the attempt.
Psychic Instability
Elite Spell. Interrupt the target foe's action. If that action was a skill, that foe and nearby foes are knocked down for 2...4...4 seconds. (50% failure chance with Fast Casting 4 or less.)

spell.name: Soothing Memories
entries: Heal a creature's wounds by reminding it of pleasant memories.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d12} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If you are holding an object created by a spell, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting. You can only regain a spell slot this way once per short rest.
Soothing Memories
Spell. Target ally is healed for 10...82...100 Health. If you are holding an item, you gain 3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Light
entries: {@bold Elite}
Bathe a creature in healing light.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If you are under the effect of a beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB} spell, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting. You can only regain a spell slot this way thrice per short rest.
Healing Light
Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 40...88...100 Health. If your target has an enchantment, you gain 1...3...3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Soul Bind
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Bind up a soul of a creature, retaliating at all who dare help it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, target the healer. The new target takes {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage.

components.m: a length of rope made of phase spider silk

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Bind
Elite Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 20...68...80 damage. This hex ends if target is suffering from a Smiting Prayers hex.

spell.name: Glass Arrows
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Preparation}
Tip your arrows with glass heads, which shatter on impact, {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} if blocked.

For the duration, when you miss a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 3d4} damage. Additionally, if you hit a target, they take an additional {@damage 3d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Glass Arrows
Elite Preparation. For 10...30...35 seconds, your arrows strike for +5...17...20 damage if they hit and cause Bleeding for 10...18...20 seconds if they are blocked.

m.text: arrowheads made of glass worth 50+ GP, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Preservation
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Preservation|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Preservation to your will, healing one of your allies every turn.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Preservation|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Preservation
Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...11...14 spirit. Every 4 seconds, this spirit heals one non-spirit ally in the area for 10...94...115 Health. This spirit dies after 90 seconds.

spell.name: Forceful Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Unblockable}
You deliver a particularly forceful blow, weakening your target and knocking them out of any stance they were in.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any stance on the target ends, and they are weakened for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Forceful Blow

Elite Hammer Attack. If Forceful Blow hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage and any stance being used by target foe ends. Target foe suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Locust's Fury
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Unleash a swam of locust, which sometimes strike at your opponents.
For the duration, when you make a weapon attach with a weapon with light and thrown property, if you roll a 16 or higher on the die, you can immediately attack again.
Locust's Fury
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...30...35 seconds, you have an additional 50% chance to double strike while using daggers.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shatterstone
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Lodge an unstable chunk of ice into a creature's flesh, which explodes in a violent explosion of ice shards a few seconds later.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone. When this spell ends, target each hostile creature in a 15-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} cold damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Shatterstone

Elite Hex Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...85...100 cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for 25...85...100 cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Recurring Insecurity
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Psychically torture a creature by replaying one of it's greatest insecurities.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d12} psychic damage.
When this spell ends, and the target is under the effect of another detrimental spell, the target is immediately hexed with Recurring Insecurity again.
Recurring Insecurity
Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers from -1...4...5 Health degeneration. If that foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end, it is reapplied.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Life Sheath
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Sheath a creature in a reversing aura.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the latest two harmful conditions on the target. Additionally, for the duration, the next time the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage and the target regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Sheath

Elite Enchantment Spell. Remove 0...2...2 condition[s] from target ally. For 8 seconds, the next time that ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead (maximum 20...84...100).

spell.name: Spoil Victor
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Punish a creature for targeting weaker creatures than it with a crown made of blood, which spikes them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target targets a creature with less hit points than it, with an attack or spell, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Spoil Victor
Elite Hex Spell. For 3...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or casts a spell on a creature with less Health, that foe loses 25...85...100 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Heal as One
entries: {@bold Companion}, {@bold Elite}
Channel the primal bond of wilderness between yourself and your companion.

Choose one companion that you can see within range. You and the target regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spell casting ability modifier. Additionally, for the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage and the target regains hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.

Alternatively, you target a companion that has died within the last minute. The companion returns to life with 10% of their maximum hit points. This spell can't return to life a companion that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a companion {@condition charmed} by it.
Heal as One

Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, your animal companion steals 1...16...20 Health whenever it hits with an attack. You and your companion are both healed for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it's resurrected with 50% Health. If you have this skill equipped, your companion will travel with you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ritual Lord
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 2%
Tap into the primeval power of previous spirit channelers by consuming a bit of your own blood as tithe to boost your ritualism spells.

While casting a ritualist themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can simultaneously cast this spell. When doing so, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
You cannot cast this spell again for 1 minute, unless the spell empowered by this spell was a spell which summoned/created a creature.
At 5th level, you cast the empowered spell with a spell slot which is two levels higher. This level increase increases by 1 when you reach 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Ritual Lord

Elite Skill. For 5...29...35 seconds, your Ritualist attributes are boosted by 2...4...4 for your next skill. If that skill is a Binding Ritual, it recharges 10...50...60% faster and Ritual Lord recharges instantly.

spell.name: Primal Rage
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Channel the primal rage of ancient times, letting a spirit of the wild overtake you.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn and your speed is increased by 25%, but you take 50% more damage.
Primal Rage
Elite Stance. For 1...12...15 second[s], you attack 33% faster and move 25% faster, but you take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Moebius Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Off-Hand Attack:} Must instead follow a {@background Dual Attack|GuildWars}.
Weave your dagger in a geometric shape, bending space-time and allowing you to act quicker than normal.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target is now below 50% of their maximum hit points, you can immediately attack again.
Moebius Strike

Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a Dual Attack. If it hits, Moebius Strike strikes for +10...30...35 damage. If you strike a foe whose Health is below 50%, all your other attack skills are recharged.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Shockwave
entries: {@bold Elite}
Release a massive shockwave at your location, kicking up dust and debris.

Target each creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d8} force damage, and is {@condition blinded} for the duration.

Then, target each creature other than you within a 15-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} bludgeoning damage, and has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for the duration.

Finally, target each creature other than you within a 20-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} piercing damage, and is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Shockwave

Elite Spell. All foes in the area take 15...51...60 earth damage and are Weakened for 1...8...10 second[s]. Nearby foes also take +15...51...60 earth damage and have Cracked Armor for 1...8...10 second[s]. Adjacent foes suffer the previous effects, take +15...51...60 earth damage, and are Blinded for 1...8...10 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Shared Burden
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Send flashes of traumatic experiences through a group of creatures, slowing them down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, a target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells which take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast. Additionally, for the duration, a target's speed is halved, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn.
Shared Burden
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ray of Judgment
entries: {@bold Elite}
Bring down divine judgment, eviscerating everything.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 30-foot-radius, 10-mile-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 15d8} radiant damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for 1 round, taking {@damage 5d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder to a different location within range and sight.
Ray of Judgment

Elite Spell. Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to this location take 5...37...45 holy damage each second and begin Burning for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 10th level or higher, the radiant damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 9th.

spell.name: Vampiric Spirit
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Invoke the spirit of a vampire to steal health from a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. Additionally, For the duration at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} hit points.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Vampiric Spirit
Elite Enchantment Spell. Steal up to 5...41...50 Health from target foe. For 10 seconds, you have +5...9...10 Health regeneration.

components.m: the fang of a vampire encased in amber

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage and healing each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Lacerate
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of laceration, intensifying slashing damage and {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} everything on death.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes slashing damage, they take an additional {@damage 4d4} damage. Additionally, when the spirit disappears, each creature within 120 feet of it starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 4d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Lacerate

Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Bleeding creatures within its range suffer -2 Health degeneration. When this spirit dies, all non-spirit creatures within its range that have less than 90% Health begin Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Spirits
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest, {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Anger|GuildWars}, {@creature Spirit of Hate|GuildWars}, {@creature Spirit of Suffering|GuildWars}
Activate your signet of Spirits, calling forth three dark spirits to aid you.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Pain|GuildWars}, a {@creature Spirit of Hate|GuildWars} and a {@creature Spirit of Suffering|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirits are friendly to you and your allies. The spirits act on your initiative, but take their turn directly after yours. The spirits are in the DMs control.
Signet of Spirits
Elite Signet. Create 3 level 1...10...12 spirits. These spirits deal 5...17...20 damage with attacks and die after 60 seconds.

spell.name: Quivering Blade

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5, {@bold Elite}
Vibrate your blade at a disrupting frequency and then slash at your opponent, disorienting them if they moved.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Quivering Blade
Elite Sword Attack. If Quivering Blade hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage. If this attack hits a moving foe, that foe is Dazed for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Palm Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Elite}
Deliver a palm strike to a creature's legs, crippling them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects takes {@damage 2d6} damage, is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for 1 round and this attack counts as an {@background Off-Hand Attack|GuildWars}.
Palm Strike
Elite Skill. Target touched foe takes 10...54...65 damage and is Crippled for 1...4...5 second[s]. This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Star Burst
entries: {@bold Elite}
Release a miniature supernova from your hands, incinerating everything.

You touch a creature. Target each hostile creature in a 20-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for 1 round, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
If the number of creatures who took damage is equal or greater to the level of the spell slot expended, you regain that spell slot.
Star Burst
Elite Spell. Target touched foe and all foes in the area are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...4 second[s]. For each foe you hit, gain 2 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Shatter Storm
entries: {@bold Elite}
Bombard a creature with a flurry of magic shattering spikes, removing all beneficial spells from them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. All beneficial spells on the target end. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, {@spell Shatter Storm|GuildWars} cannot be used again until N rounds have passed, where N is the number of spells ended.
Shatter Storm
Elite Spell. Target foe loses all enchantments. For each enchantment removed this way, Shatter Storm is disabled for an additional 7 seconds.

spell.name: Withdraw Hexes
entries: {@bold Elite}
Gently ease the suffering of a group of allies.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Target each friendly creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. All harmful {@status Concentration|XPHB} spells on a target end. If a harmful spell was ended this way, {@spell Withdraw Hexes|GuildWars} cannot be used again until N rounds have passed, where N is the number of spells ended.
Withdraw Hexes
Elite Spell. Remove all hexes from target ally and all adjacent allies. This spell takes an additional 20...8...5 seconds to recharge for each hex removed in this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Wail of Doom
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%
Release a piercing wail of doom, rending the soul from a creature's body.
Choose one creature that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target's ability scores are set to 1 and their proficiency bonus is set to 0.
Wail of Doom
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...3...4 second[s], all of target foe's attributes are set to 0.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 10th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 9th.

spell.name: Melandru's Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@bold Elite}
Invoke the vine wrath of Melandru with your next shot.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 3d4} damage and if the target willingly moved on its last turn or is {@condition prone}, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage and is also {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Melandru's Shot

Elite Bow Attack. If Melandru's Shot hits, your target begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds. If it hits a foe that is moving or knocked down, that foe takes +10...22...25 damage and is Crippled for 5...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Soul Twisting
entries: {@bold Elite}
Twist the souls of the creatures summoned by your Summoning Rituals, reducing the burden on yourself.

For the duration, when you cast a spell which summons/creates a creature, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d4} levels lower than required (minimum 1). The creature summoned/created this way still treats the spell slot used as the original one for the purpose of determining its stat block.
Additionally, you can take any {@action Magic|XPHB} Action which summons/creates creatures as a bonus action.
Soul Twisting
Elite Skill. For 5...37...45 seconds, your Binding Rituals cost 15 less Energy (minimum 10) and recharge instantly. Soul Twisting ends after 1...3...3 Binding Ritual[s].

m.text: a knotted rope made of spirit fiber worth 750+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the spell slot reduction increases by 1 for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Seeping Wound
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Magically worsen an already existing wound by making acid start pouring from it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. For the duration, the target's speed is reduced by 33%, and at the start of each of the target's turns, if the target is suffering from at least one harmful condition, the target takes {@damage 8d4} acid damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage at the start of each turn for the duration, but suffers no other effect.
Seeping Wound
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...6...7 second[s], target foe moves 33% slower. That foe takes 5...21...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition. This spell has half the normal range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Unsteady Ground
entries: {@bold Elite}
Create an area of unstable ground by causing extreme vibrations.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 15-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d8} force damage, and targets who attacked on their last turn are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.
Unsteady Ground
Elite Spell. You create Unsteady Ground at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, nearby foes take 10...34...40 earth damage each second. Attacking foes struck by Unsteady Ground are knocked down.

components.m: a small branch with leaves and a handful of sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Stolen Speed
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Slow down creatures and invert the time flow around them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, a target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells which take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast. Additionally, any spell, which takes an action to cast, targeting only creatures affected by Stolen Speed, can be cast as a bonus action.
Stolen Speed

Elite Hex Spell. For 1...8...10 seconds, spells cast by the target foe and all adjacent foes take 100% longer to cast. Spells targeting these foes that are cast by you or your allies take 50% less time to cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Word of Censure
entries: {@bold Elite}
Speak a word of censure, restricting a creatures' life force.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 5d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
If the target was below 33% of their maximum hit points, {@spell Word of Censure|GuildWars} cannot be used again until 2 rounds have passed.
Word of Censure
Elite Spell. Target foe takes 15...63...75 holy damage. If your target was below 33% Health, Word of Censure takes 20 additional seconds to recharge.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Weaken Knees
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Give a creature phantom pains, especially while they move, by temporarily aging them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage. Additionally, for every 5 it travels, it takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage.
Weaken Knees
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...13...16 second[s], target foe suffers -1...3...4 Health degeneration and takes 5...9...10 damage while moving.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Trapper's Focus
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Preparation}
Intensely focus on your ability to lay traps and surviving.

For the duration, you can cast spells, which take a minute to cast, which place some kind of trap, as an action, and cannot be interrupted while doing so. Additionally, when you cast a wilderness survival themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is {@dice 1d4} levels higher than the one used in the casting.
Trapper's Focus
Elite Preparation. For 12...22...24 seconds, your trap skills are not easily interruptible and your Wilderness Survival attribute is increased by +0...2...2.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell slot increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Spirit Channeling
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Channel the spirits of great spellcasters.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 4th level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 12 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
If there is at least one friendly summoning ritual within 150-feet of you, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Spirit Channeling
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 12 seconds, you have +1...5...6 Energy regeneration. When you cast this spell, you gain 3...10...12 Energy if you are within earshot of a spirit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shove
entries: {@bold Elite}

Choose one creature within range. If the target is large or smaller, it's knocked {@condition prone}. If the target willingly moved on its last turn, they take {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and any stance they are in ends.
Shove
Elite Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down. If that foe was moving, that foe's stance ends and that foe takes 15...63...75 damage before being knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the affected size category increases by 1 for every two slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shadow Form
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Turn your body into shadows.

For the duration, you cannot be targeted by hostile spells and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} per beneficial assassin themed spell on you and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, for the duration, you cannot deal more than 10 damage with a single damage roll.
Shadow Form

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...18...21 seconds, you cannot be the target of enemy spells, and you gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than 5...21...25 damage with a single skill or attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the final number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th and the damage maximum increases by 5 for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Spirit Light Weapon
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Weapon Spell}
Infuse a weapon with the calming light of a good spirit.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Additionally, while the creature is within 150-feet of a friendly summoning ritual, they regain additional hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of their turn.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Spirit Light Weapon
Elite Weapon Spell. For 10 seconds, target ally gains 1...12...15 Health per second and an additional 1...12...15 Health per second if that ally is within earshot of a spirit.

spell.name: Triple Chop

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Elite}
Quickly perform multiple hit with your weapon, striking everything around you.

Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
Triple Chop
Elite Axe Attack. Attack target foe and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +10...34...40 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Whirling Axe

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Unblockable}
Quickly whirl your weapon, feinting past your opponent's defenses and leaving them of balance.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, any stance on the target ends, and they take {@damage 2d6} damage
Whirling Axe
Elite Axe Attack. If Whirling Axe hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 4th on a hit.

spell.name: Aura of Stability
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Give a creature a short burst of divine stability.
Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration, the target is immune to the {@condition prone} condition.
The amount of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Aura of Stability
Enchantment Spell. For 3...7...8 seconds, target other ally cannot be knocked down.

spell.name: Snare (Guild Wars)
entries: Prepare a snare trap, crippling anyone stepping inside.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 1 round:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Strength saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for one minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Strength saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
This trap is nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC to be discerned.
Snare
Trap. When Snare is triggered, all nearby foes become Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds. Snare ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

spell.name: Tranquil Was Tanasen
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Urn}
Create a golden urn holding the ashes of Tanasen, who is said to have never raised their voice.

You create an Urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting spells or using abilities, you automatically succeed on Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status Concentration|XPHB}, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Tranquil Was Tanasen
Elite Item Spell. Hold Tanasen's ashes for up to 5...17...20 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you have +10...22...25 armor and cannot be interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd

spell.name: Shadow Shroud
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Cover a creature in a shroud of shadow, hiding them from beneficial spells.
For the duration, the target cannot be the target of, or benefit from, beneficial spells.
Shadow Shroud
Elite Hex Spell. For 3...8...9 seconds, target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shroud of Silence
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Envelop yourself and a creature in a shroud of silence.
You touch a creature. The target and you cannot cast spells for the duration.
Shroud of Silence
Elite Hex Spell. All of your spells are disabled for 15 seconds. For 1...3...3 second[s], target touched foe cannot cast spells.

spell.name: Vengeful Was Khanhei
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Urn}
Create a scarlet Urn, containing the ashes of Khanhei, a revenant so vile it had to be banished by a high priestess of Dwayna.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, when you take damage from a creature, target that creature. The target takes {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Vengeful Was Khanhei
Elite Item Spell. Hold Khanhei's ashes for 5...10...11 seconds. Whenever a foe strikes you in combat while you are holding Khanhei's ashes, you steal 5...29...35 Health from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Siphon Strength
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Tap into the energy flows of a creature, disrupting theirs and improving your understanding of them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target makes a damage roll using a weapon, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, for the duration, the number someone needs to roll to score a critical hit against the target gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st and the number someone needs to roll to score a critical hit against the target get reduced by 1 for each slot level above 1st.
Siphon Strength
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe deals 5...41...50 less damage with attacks and all of your attacks against that foe have an additional 33% chance of being a critical hit.

spell.name: Wanderlust
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Wanderlust|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of wanderlust, punishing those who are not moving.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Wanderlust|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Wanderlust

Elite Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. Whenever this spirit's attack hits a stationary foe, that foe is knocked down and the spirit loses 70...54...50 Health. This spirit dies after 30...54...60 seconds.

spell.name: Temple Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Off-Hand Attack}
Strike at a creature's weak point, disorienting them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} and {@condition blinded} for the duration, and if it is {@status Concentration|XPHB|Concentrating}, its {@status Concentration|XPHB} is broken.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Temple Strike
Elite Off-Hand Attack. Must follow a lead attack. If this attack hits, target foe is Dazed and Blinded for 1...8...10 seconds, and if target foe is casting a spell, that foe is interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Weapon of Quickening
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Weapon Spell}
Temporarily transform a weapon into a quickening weapon, visibly making its appearance more sleek and elegant.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, the target can cast spells as an action, even if they already cast a spell as a bonus action on their turn, and the target can cast spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action.
Weapon of Quickening
Elite Weapon Spell. For 5...21...25 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Quickening, and spells and binding rituals recharge 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Way of the Empty Palm
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Channel your energies into precision strikes.
For the duration, when you cast an {@background Off-Hand Attack|GuildWars} or {@background Dual Attack|GuildWars} spell of 1st level or lower, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Way of the Empty Palm
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Weapons of Three Forges
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Weapon Spell}
Call upon the power of the great Obsidian Forge in the Fissure of Woe to bestow weapons unto your allies.

Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. For the duration, each creature is under the effect of random {@background Weapon Spell|GuildWars}, except {@spell Weapons of Three Forges|GuildWars}. If a spell is below the level of this spell, it is instead applied at the level of this spell. Otherwise, it is cast at the lowest level possible.
Weapons of Three Forges
Elite Weapon Spell. For 3...17...20 seconds, each non-spirit ally in earshot gains the effect of a random Weapon Spell. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 10 minutes. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 1 hour.

spell.name: Black Lotus Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Lead Attack}
Channel the mana gaining of the famed black lotus.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d12} damage. If the target was suffering from a harmful spell, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Black Lotus Strike
Lead Attack. If it hits, Black Lotus Strike strikes for +10...27...31 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, you gain 5...11...13 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Arc Lightning
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Conjure an arc of lightning, which can strike multiple targets.

Choose one creature within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} lightning damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Overcast:} You can target two additional creatures within 15 of your original target with this spell aswell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.
Arc Lightning

Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...33...40 lightning damage. If you are Overcast, two foes near your target are struck for 15...71...85 lightning damage. Damage from Arc Lightning has 25% armor penetration.

spell.name: Accumulated Pain
entries: Suddenly intensify an already suffering creature's pain.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage and if the target is suffering from at least two different spells, they gain a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Accumulated Pain
Spell. Target foe takes 15...63...75 damage. If target foe is suffering from 2 or more hexes, that foe suffers a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Deny Hexes
entries: Deny any hexes by invoking your divine connection.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest N harmful spell on the target ends, where N is the number of spell slots expended since the last long rest, in the casting of divine themed spells, including this one.
Deny Hexes
Spell. Remove one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final N increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Animate Vampiric Horror
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Vampiric Horror.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Vampiric Horror|GuildWars}.
The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Vampiric Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Vampiric Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another bone horror this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Vampiric Horror
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage, you gain the same amount of Health.

spell.name: Bestial Mauling
entries: {@bold Companion}
Command your companion to brutally maul a {@condition prone} creature.

Choose one companion, that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 6d6} damage, and if the target is {@condition prone}, it is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Bestial Mauling
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Mauling that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a knocked-down foe, that foe is Dazed for 4...9...10 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Ancestors' Rage
entries: Mark a creature for destruction, by invoking the rage of the ancestors.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. When this spell ends, each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d10} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Ancestors' Rage
Skill. For 1 second, nothing happens. When this skill ends, all foes adjacent to target ally are struck for 5...89...110 lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: None Shall Pass!
entries: Bellow out a command, forcing creatures to submit to your will.

Target each hostile creature, that willingly moved on its last turn, that can hear you within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Afterward, roll a {@dice d20}. On N or higher, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting of this spell, where N is 20 - the number of targets who failed their Saving Throw.
"None Shall Pass!"
Shout. All nearby foes that are moving are knocked down. This skill recharges 1...7...8 second[s] faster for each foe knocked down (maximum 25 seconds).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Black Mantis Thrust

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light property

entries: {@bold Lead Attack}
Quickly strike at your target, just like a black mantis.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage and if they are suffering from at least one detrimental spell, they are {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Black Mantis Thrust
Lead Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +8...18...20 damage. If target foe is suffering from a Hex, that foe is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Bed of Coals
entries: Create a bed of coals, {@condition burning|GuildWars} {@condition prone} creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 5-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.

If a creature is {@condition prone} in the cylinder, they start {@condition burning|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. They can only start {@condition burning|GuildWars} this way once per round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Bed of Coals

Spell. Create a Bed of Coals at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to target foe are struck for 5...24...29 fire damage each second. Any foe knocked down on the Bed of Coals is set on fire for 3...6...7 seconds.

spell.name: Ethereal Light
entries: Channel ethereal light into a creature.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Ethereal Light
Spell. Target ally is healed for 25...85...100. This spell is easily interrupted.

spell.name: Blood Drinker
entries: Steal the life force from a creature, becoming more effective the more desperate you are.
If you are above 50% of your maximum hit points, you start {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
At the end of each of your turns, you can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Blood Drinker
Spell. If your Health is above 50%, you begin Bleeding for 10 seconds. Steal up to 20...56...65 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Anguished Was Lingwah
entries: {@bold Urn}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Lingwah, amplifying the anguish you inflict.

You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, your detrimental Ritualist themed spells which require {@status Concentration|XPHB} have their duration extended by 100%. When you cast one such spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
Anguished Was Lingwah

Item Spell. Hold Lingwah's ashes for up to 10...50...60 seconds. While you hold her ashes, your Ritualist hexes cost 1...4...5 less energy and last 33% longer. When you drop her ashes all your Ritualist hexes are recharged.

components.m: the ashes of a tortured creature

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd and the % increases by 50% for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: On Your Knees!
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You lose all Adrenaline.

If there are any hostile {@condition prone} creatures within range, you can immediately cast any stance spell without using a spell slot, ignoring adrenaline cost, casting time and components, which you have prepared.
"On Your Knees!"
Shout. Lose all adrenaline. If any adjacent foes are knocked down, all of your stances are recharged.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blades of Steel

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon with the light and thrown property

entries: {@bold Dual Attack}
Release a burst of stored power from your previous attacks.

Make two melee weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage Nd6} damage and, where N is the number of spell slots expended in the casting of light weapon attack themed spells.
Blades of Steel
Dual Attack. Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, this attack strikes for +5...14...16 damage (maximum bonus 60) for each recharging dagger attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Critical Defenses
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Quickly deflect incoming attacks.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC. When you score a critical hit, the duration of this spell resets.
Critical Defenses
Enchantment Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block. Critical Defenses refreshes every time you land a critical hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Breath of Fire
entries: {@bold Overcast:} 5
Release a continuous stream of dragon fire at a location.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 10-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 5d10} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 60 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Breath of Fire
Spell. Create Breath of Fire at target foe's current location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 10...34...40 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Extinguish
entries: Relieve your parties conditions, healing them if you extinguished any {@condition burning|GuildWars} creatures.

Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. End the latest of harmful condition on each target. If {@condition burning|GuildWars} was removed this way, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Extinguish
Spell. Remove one condition from each party member. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...82...100 Health.

spell.name: Conflagration
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of Conflagration, which ignites all projectiles.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and deals non-fire damage with a ranged weapon attack, they instead deal fire damage.
Conflagration
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all arrows that hit strike for fire damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Binding Chains
entries: {@bold Hex}
Conjure up the chains of the damned.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, a target's speed is reduced by 90%, and for every foot a target travels, they take {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage.
Binding Chains
Hex Spell. For 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes move 90% slower and take 1...24...30 damage each second while moving.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

table.name: Charm Animal Beast List
table.caption: Charm Animal Beast List
footnotes: Anything below a 1 counts as a 1.
intro: Used in the casting of the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} Spell.

background.name: Adrenaline
entries: Adrenaline must be spent to cast spells with the Adrenaline tag.
Instead of spending the corresponding spell slot, you spend Adrenaline equal to the number given after the tag, which is the base cost.
To upcast an Adrenaline spell, you must pay the base cost for each additional level, and you can only upcast it to a level for which you have spell slots.

You start gaining Adrenaline as soon as you prepare any spell which has the Adrenaline tag. You gain one strike of Adrenaline any time you take damage from a non-friendly source, or you deal damage to a hostile creature or object with a weapon attack.
You lose all Adrenaline outside of combat and cannot gain Adrenaline outside of combat.

background.name: Air Magic
entries: No inherent effect. Many Elementalist skills, especially spells that deal lightning damage to and debilitate a single enemy, become more effective with higher Air Magic.

background.name: Allegiance rank
entries: Allegiance rank is a term for a pair of title tracks: the Friend of the Kurzicks title track and the Friend of the Luxons title track. They are earned for your account through the transfer of Kurzick faction or Luxon faction. These titles can be displayed in the 'Honor' monument from tier 4 onwards.

background.name: Armor Penetration
entries: The damage inflicted ignores damage reduction and resistance.
It does not ignore immunities.

background.name: Ascalon
entries: Once, Ascalon was a beautiful, fertile land of rolling green countryside and magnificent cities. Her people were viewed as grim by their neighbors. This was perhaps, to be expected, given their never-ending war against the aggressive Charr. Indeed, it was their unfailing vigilance, their Great Northern Wall, and the blood they shed each year to defend it that had protected not only Ascalon, but also Kryta and Orr through the ages.
Then came the invasion, and with it, the Searing.

Anyone alive today will remember the day the lands of Ascalon were blasted and torn with magic fire. Whole cities and guilds were destroyed in the Searing, and the might of Ascalon was shattered. Now the Great Northern Wall lies broken, and the Charr have overrun much of the kingdom, defiling it with their unholy shrines, killing those who stand in their way.

The survival of Ascalon hinges on but a single remaining corner of the fallen kingdom—the capital city of Rin. In the final years of the last Guild War, the people of Rin looked to a soldier named Adelbern, a simple man of humble origins, who rallied the people with his courage and cunning and steeled them not only against the guilds of Orr and Kryta but also against the terrors of the Charr.

The sudden destruction of most of the kingdom during the Searing has taken much of the fight out of the man now known as King Adelbern. He has become stubborn and set in his ways, afraid of losing what little he has left. But in his son Rurik, the people see a leader with the courage to perhaps help them reclaim their fallen kingdom.

The survivors of Ascalon live in a state of constant warfare, using hit-and-run tactics and the remnants of the Great Wall to prevent any significant advances by the Charr into their territory. King Adelbern has circled the wagons, so to speak, content to simply defend what Ascalon has left and live to fight another day. Prince Rurik, on the other hand, is far more daring than his father thinks is wise, and has even suggested that the time may be coming to launch an offensive against the Charr.

Already the rumbling of the winds of change can be heard in the streets. People are frightened. They wonder what will become of them. Some even wonder aloud if Adelbern has lost what it takes to steer Ascalon back from the brink. They wish to see the prince step up and take command of the kingdom. Perhaps under his guidance, the people of Ascalon will live on to see another golden age.

background.name: Assassin
entries: The Assassin walks the shadows, a deadly viper ready to strike at the heart when the enemy least expects it, nowhere and everywhere all at once. Assassins are masters of their chosen weapon, the dagger, and are expert at inflicting Critical Strikes that cause massive damage. The Assassin is trained to efficiently link attacks together in a chain that does not give the enemy a chance to hit back. They have mastered the ability to move as shadows—Assassins wear only lightweight armor and prefer to avoid damage by not being there when the enemy’s strike lands. Their other magical skills include Hexes that lower the target’s defenses and protect the Assassin from harm.

background.name: Axe Mastery
entries: Axe Mastery increases the damage you do with axes and your chance to inflict a critical hit when using an axe. Many skills, especially axe attack skills become more effective with higher Axe Mastery.

background.name: Beast Mastery
entries: Beast Mastery increases the damage dealt by your animal companion and its chance to inflict a critical hit. Many Ranger skills, especially those related to making your animal companion stronger, become more effective with higher Beast Mastery.

background.name: Blood Magic
entries: No inherent effect. Many Necromancer skills, especially spells that damage and steal health from your foes, become more effective with higher Blood Magic.

background.name: Bond
entries: For the duration of the bond, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.
You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1).
The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall unconscious (this includes going to sleep).
You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

background.name: Channeling Magic
entries: No inherent effect. Many Ritualist skills, especially those related to lightning damage and Energy, become more effective with higher Channeling Magic.

background.name: Charr Homelands
entries: The Charr Homelands lie to the north of Ascalon and, as the name implies, is the current homeland of the Charr. Its geography is much like how Ascalon was before the Searing and is home to Grawl, Skale, Worms, and a variety of Devourers among other creatures. Its true name is unknown.
The Elder Dragon Kralkatorrik can be seen sleeping in the center of this region, between the three explorable areas.

background.name: Command
entries: No inherent effect. Many Paragon skills, especially those that protect your allies or increase your tactical position on the battlefield, become more effective with higher Command.

background.name: Communing
entries: No inherent effect. Many Ritualist skills, especially those related to summoning Spirits, become more effective with higher Communing.

background.name: Companion
entries: Valid targets for companion spells are creatures charmed via the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell, or other creatures under your control, like a Beast Master Ranger’s beast companion.
Non-Valid targets are any form of summoned or created creatures, like undead created by {@spell Animate Dead|XPHB} or summoned by spells like {@spell Summon Fey|XPHB}.

background.name: Critical Strikes
entries: For each rank of Critical Strikes you have, you gain an additional 1% chance to critical hit. Whenever you critical hit, you gain 1 energy at ranks 3 and above, 2 energy at ranks 8 and above, and 3 energy at 13 ranks above.

background.name: Crystal Desert
entries: Legends tell of a time, thousands of years ago, when the Crystal Desert was covered in water. These legends claim that it was the gods who raised the land, leaving it bare and empty in order to give the solitary creatures of the world a place to call their own. If the legends are true, humans were not among those for whom this land was made. There have been attempts by humans to settle in the desert, but they have, without exception, failed miserably, leaving behind only the grand monuments they built here proclaiming their short-lived triumph over this harsh land.

The weather in the Crystal Desert is hot and unforgiving. The winds blow hard, making and unmaking dunes, covering up the present and uncovering the past. An examination of the sand will reveal that each grain is actually a tiny, pointed crystal. In isolated locations, larger crystal formations have been revealed by the constant, unforgiving wind.

background.name: Curses
entries: No inherent effect. Many Necromancer skills, especially Hex spells which reduce your foes' effectiveness in battle, become more effective with higher Curses.

background.name: Dagger Mastery
entries: Dagger Mastery increases the damage you do with daggers and your chance to inflict a critical hit when using a dagger. There is a 2% chance per rank of Dagger Mastery that attacks from your daggers will double strike. Many skills, especially dagger attack skills, become more effective with higher Dagger Mastery.

background.name: Deadly Arts
entries: No Inherent effect. Many Assassins skills, especially those related to harming enemies, become more effective with higher Deadly Arts.

background.name: Death Magic
entries: Without Death Magic, you can control no more than two undead servants. For every two ranks of Death Magic, you can control one additional undead servant. Many Necromancer skills, especially those that animate undead servants, manipulate corpses, and deal cold damage, become more effective with higher Death Magic.

background.name: Dervish
entries: Serving the gods as holy warriors, dervishes stand confidently in the whirlwind of conflict. Martial techniques perfected in the deserts of Elona allow a Dervish’s scythe to lash out quickly at multiple opponents, surrounding the holy warrior with a swath of destruction.
